column2: an A.M. Eatery////Tried it for the first time this last week. It is crazy busy on the weekends
column3: so tried a Monday at 11:00 AM. It was still packed
column4: but a much more manageable 15 minute wait. I had one of their benedicts
column5: and it was awesome. The other guests had the huesvos rancheros and they even had a great quinoa dish for my vegetarian friend. Looking at the menu
column7: it seems like the sweet pancakes are where the hype is for this place. Good vibe
